title: Weird thing happening with the media control on pixel
content:
When you use a media such as YouTube premium and you go to the home screen you can swipe down to see the notification panel and it says "bedroom TV" when it's playing through my phone and I don't know why it says bedroom TV because my TV does not have Bluetooth attached to it and Google said that casting using that was not available yet 
https://photos.app.goo.gl/TT3Ke6o9Mo1JEVBR6 - the link to the screen recording
